title: Move To IOS issues, pixel 2 not communicating
content:
Trying to move to I phone after some major disappointment with the pixel 3's speakephone issues. 
I have literally tried everything to get this to connect including tech support from both apple and pixel. 
EDIT: In my house we have 4 pixel products and none of them will transfer data to an i phone through MOVE TO IOS software. Have to do it manually.
Thanks
